mapper.select: SELECT m.id id, m.author author, u.username authorUserName, u.nickname authorNickName, m.msg msg, m.has_read hasRead, m.receiver receiver, u2.username receiverUserName, u2.nickname receiverNickName, m.status status, DATE_FORMAT(m.create_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') createTime, DATE_FORMAT(m.update_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') updateTime FROM message m LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON m.author = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON m.receiver = u2.id WHERE m.status != -1 And id= #{id} And author = #{author} And has_read = #{hasRead} And receiver = #{receiver} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (author, msg, receiver) VALUES ( #{author}, #{msg}, #{receiver})
mapper.update: UPDATE message SET has_read = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE message SET status=-1 WHERE id = #{id}
